snippet.title: K-Star Patrol for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Commodore VIC-20


Game description:

K-Star Patrol is a side-scrolling shoot'em-up played in different sectors.

Bonus ships serve as extra lives, but be careful as they can be destroyed!


What I think:

Okay game, that is almost average...

See, I got 2 problems with this game.

The first one is that the extra lives can be destroyed. Now while that is an unique idea, it is also not a good one, as it is hard to protect the ship you shoot with AND all of the extra ships\lives.

The second problem is the swarm that, if it touches your ship you shoot with, can not shoot anymore and that also counts for the extra ships!
